title: Negative RP
body: sooooo I've never had this happen before and wanted to report it. I bought the Calvary Sejuani skin while it was on sale for 675 RP and I had 1340 in my account. I was charged twice for it I think. Because 675 + 675 =1350 and it says -10. So yeah. My picture wouldn't load, but if you need proof I'll try again. Thanks for any help or an explanation! :)

replies.body:
Hiya! 

This is likely a visual bug. If you try logging out and logging back in, this should resolve the issue.

If you were actually charged twice, please submit a ticket to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests) so we can take a look at your account and make any necessary adjustments. :]
